channel.title: TGaceAllStories
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from TGaceAllStories, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Military appeals court lets 9/11 plea deals proceed after defense secretary moves to rescind them
item.description: The U.S. Court of Military Commission Review rejected Defense Secretary Lloyd Austin's attempt to unravel plea agreements with three 9/11 defendants.

item.title: The breakout stocks of 2024 that are not in the tech sector
item.description: While 2024 saw megacap technology stocks propel the stock market to new heights, there were some standouts outside of the tech space.

item.title: The battered bond market starts 2025 facing some difficult issues about debt
item.description: Investors face multiple challenges in the year ahead, including one under-the-radar worry about short term notes coming due.

item.title: Russian gas era in Europe ends as Ukraine stops transit
item.description: Ukraine's decision marks the end of decades of Moscow's dominance over Europe's energy markets.
